sqls.sql: UPDATE cq_quote_b SET quote_id = @quote_id, quote_price = @quote_price, quote_qty = @quote_qty, quote_currency = @quote_currency, quote_spec_1 = @quote_spec_1, quote_spec_2 = @quote_spec_2, quote_spec_3 = @quote_spec_3, quote_spec_4 = @quote_spec_4, quote_spec_5 = @quote_spec_5, quote_spec_6 = @quote_spec_6, quote_spec_7 = @quote_spec_7, quote_spec_8 = @quote_spec_8, quote_spec_9 = @quote_spec_9, quote_spec_10 = @quote_spec_10, remark1 = @remark1, remark2 = @remark2, remark3 = @remark3, remark4 = @remark4, remark5 = @remark5, crt_user = @crt_user, crt_host = @crt_host, crt_time = @crt_time, upd_user = @upd_user, upd_host = @upd_host, upd_time = @upd_time, crt_user_no = @crt_user_no, crt_user_name = @crt_user_name, upd_user_no = @upd_user_no, upd_user_name = @upd_user_name;
